long-description.p:
The setting for this cache is in the grounds of and old church near the village of Donaghmore dating back to the early 1700’s.
One of its Parish Priests was Fr Pat Ferrall who was noted to be active in the 1798 rebellion and a “stern and uncompromising patriot”
You can read some more about the 1798 Irish Rebellion Here
At the above location note the double dates on the plaque call the A.B.C.D E.F.G.H
please retrieve and replace the cache with extreme care to Prevent Muggles from Discovering the cache.

ul.li:
2010-03-15T19:00:00Z : Found it by Mausfallensteller
Really nice place out here.
in: TB Tasmanian devil out: TB racing car
Thanks for showing! [;)]

2009-09-27T19:00:00Z : Found it by photomaniac99
My first find!

2009-09-27T19:00:00Z : Found it by abra123cadabra
After doing the maths this cache was quickly spotted and retrieved by our little cacher.
OUT: 5c coin & football sticker IN: Euro Note Rubber & Mike's Racer TB

2009-09-21T19:00:00Z : Found it by Serapis
The grass here must have been cut just this morning, the smell was fantastic. Found the dates quickly got the maths done quickly (on a roll since the last find). The co ords were excellent and I picked up the cache in no time at all. Thanks for a great cache. Serapis.

2009-07-15T19:00:00Z : Found it by Herman en Eugeni
# 901 @ 9.30 hr Found it easily on a very quit place. Thanks.

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Donaghmore Church
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
The setting for this cache is in the grounds of and old church near the village of Donaghmore dating back to the early 1700’s.
One of its Parish Priests was Fr Pat Ferrall who was noted to be active in the 1798 rebellion and a “stern and uncompromising patriot”

You can read some more about the 1798 Irish Rebellion Here

The Cache

Stage 1

At the above location note the double dates on the plaque call the A.B.C.D E.F.G.H

Final Location

The cache is at :

N 53 ((F+B)x(E+H))-A.(E+A)(D+F+E-H-C)(A+E+H)

W 006 (D+F)x(A+H)-(Bx(E+A).(F+D+A-H-C)(D-E+H-A+G)(D+G-B+E)

please retrieve and replace the cache with extreme care to Prevent Muggles from Discovering the cache.


The Windsockers

Additional Waypoints

N/S __ ° __ . ___ W/E ___ ° __ . ___
